name: Pinball Challenge - Octopus Island 3D
description:
"Pinball Challenge - Octopus Island 3D" is a type of classic pinball game which uses flipper to guide the steel ball all over the pinball table.

Use left and right buttons to activate flippers. You can miss the ball only 3 times. Be careful!

There are special missions which offer up to three times the score which include the octopus mission where you have to guide the ball into the octopus’s mouth and there is a shrimp mission as well.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive pinball game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
